title: Igniting Ivy
description: They call me a hero.I save people. It's what I do.It's the only thing I've ever wanted to do.Then I meet her â€” the girl with the sad eyes.She's lost everything. Twice.And I know she's using me to forget her past.Just when things seem perfect, that past threatens with the unimaginable.They may call me a hero.But she's the one person I can't save.Igniting Ivy can be read as a standalone romance. It is book one in a series that follows a group of firefighters.
author: Samantha Christy
